      • autoUpdate

        public ScrollableTextWidget autoUpdate(boolean autoUpdate)
        Sets the auto update property. If auto update is true the text will be deleted each time it is drawn. If builder is not null, it will then be called.
        参数:
        autoUpdate - auto update
        返回:
        this
